body:
---
johnfrost21@gmail.com

---
I'm a full stack generalist most suited for web apps.  Currently looking for a position in San Francisco involving Ruby and Javascript, though a chance to play with Node.js is a plus.

Education
-
Entrepreneurship BS, Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology
Graduated with Distinction

Skills
-----
####Langauges
+ Ruby
+ Javascript
####Frameworks
+ Ruby on Rails
+ Backbone.js
+ jQuery
+ Express on Node (beginning)
####Backend Skills
+ Typically deploy and manage on Heroku
+ Can manage the basics of an apache server
####Design Skills
+ Photoshop (advanced)
+ Illustrator
+ HTML, LESS / SCSS
+ Prototyping (Balsamiq, paper)
+ Twitter bootstrap
####Buzzwords
+ 'Prime' rails stack- postgres, rspec

Experience
-
###Experience
###Cofounder
Organizer for the [SF Backbone.js Study Group](http://www.meetup.com/jsmeetup/events/89216902/)

name: John Frost
